testcase.name: Folders array is present and contains the expected number of elements

failure.message: expected [ { id: 12, …(4) }, …(5) ] to have a length of 5 but got 6

testcase.failure: Failed 1 times. Collection JSON ID: 981e25d4-29d8-435a-b6c6-fb046da2285d. Collection name: Sendinblue. Request name: Contact management / Folders / Get all folders. Test description: Folders array is present and contains the expected number of elements. Error message: expected [ { id: 12, …(4) }, …(5) ] to have a length of 5 but got 6. Stacktrace: AssertionError: expected [ { id: 12, …(4) }, …(5) ] to have a length of 5 but got 6 at Object.eval sandbox-script.js:1:76).

testcase.name: Each folder object has required fields
Name in each folder is a non-empty string
Count accurately represents the number of folders in the response

testcase.name: Response is an object with id property

testcase.name: Total blacklisted is a non-negative integer

testcase.name: Response status code is 200

Test description: Response status code is 200. Error message: expected 401 to equal 200. Stacktrace: AssertionError: expected 401 to equal 200 at Object.eval sandbox-script.js:1:80).

testcase.name: verify that body contains status
testcase.failure: Failed 1 times. Collection JSON ID: 981e25d4-29d8-435a-b6c6-fb046da2285d. Collection name: Sendinblue. Request name: Account / Process / Return all the processes for your account. Test description: verify that body contains status. Error message: expected 'completed' to deeply equal 'queued'. Stacktrace: AssertionError: expected 'completed' to deeply equal 'queued' at Object.eval sandbox-script.js:1:143).
